item.description:

Combining consumer-grade options like DSL, cable, or wireless might seem appealing, but achieving a reliable, high-speed connection this way is practically impossible with standard routers. This innovative device combines multiple internet connections, regardless of type, into a single, high-bandwidth connection. item.title: Bonded T1 Solution Increases Bandwidth
item.description:
A 1.5 Mbps T1 bandwidth has long been a standard for small businesses, often proving sufficient for their needs. Some businesses even utilize an Integrated T1 solution for combined internet and telephone services. However, as bandwidth demands increase, many find T1 bandwidth limiting their productivity. A simple solution to increase bandwidth is adding a second T1 line, doubling it to 3 Mbps. item.title: How Broadband Bonding is Mushrooming
item.description:
Businesses with high bandwidth demands now have a delicious new option for boosting their WAN capacity thanks to the TRUFFLE from Mushroom Networks, Inc. What makes the TRUFFLE so appealing? This device can combine the bandwidth of multiple broadband connections – think DSL, Cable, T1, even satellite – to create a single, faster, and more reliable connection, similar to T1 line bonding but with more flexibility. The TRUFFLE BBNA6401 model, for instance, can aggregate up to 6 different connections, reaching download speeds of up to 50 Mbps...
